import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { }

Attendance Management System

Manage, track, and analyze attendance records efficiently.

Add Attendance

Quickly record attendance for students or employees.

Add Attendance

Reports

Generate insightful reports to analyze attendance trends.

View Reports

About the System

This system provides an easy way to manage attendance, track student or employee presence, and generate insightful reports to monitor trends. Simplify the process and ensure accuracy in attendance management.
